com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.text_to_speech.v1.model

Class CustomTranslation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.service.model.GenericModel
      • com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.text_to_speech.v1.model.CustomTranslation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ObjectModel

    public class CustomTranslation
extends GenericModel
    A customized word translation, assigning a specific pronunciation to a given word. The translation can be either a simple String of the desired pronunciation ("Sunday" as translation for "Sun."), an International Phonetic Alphabet (IPA) representation. A Japanese translation can also specify a part of speech.
    See Also:
    Customization
